page.title: 12THE GAME OF DARTS
page.content: At home I play darts, to play you need: a dart board, 3 darts each, a marker and a scoreboard. I don't have a score board so we score on paper. With my dad I play around the dart board.You have to throw your darts at number 1 then 2 and so on until you get to 20, then it's bullseye. With all the family we play a game of darts called Cricket,but it's always me and my brother versus Mum and Dad.My brother isn't very good at getting wickets.You score runs by throwing 3 darts which score over 25, to get a wicket you have to throw for the doubles on the board.
